doc.title: GNN Presents: George Washington's Wooden Pants
doc.plot: Legend tells us that George Washington the father of our country wore wooden teeth. GNN, (Gurian News Network) brings you the truth, which is that he wore wooden pants. When he chopped down the cherry tree? It was to get softer wood for his pants, which are currently on display at The Smithsonian Institute. That's why GNN is known for bringing you 'All The News That's Fit To Dance To'.
